name: MetaBalls (mamdooh)
description:
A MetaBall simulation utilizing compute shaders. Metaballs can move around the screen and bounce off walls. Different colored metaballs will mix when merging.

LeftClick - Spawn MetaBall

MiddleClick - Delete Metaball

RightClick - Drag MetaBall

Scroll - Change MetaBall Radius

Menu options on the top right can be hidden with "i"
